alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Semmes, or 8 miles west of Saraland, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Chickasaw, Chunchula, Semmes, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 158, and Mobile Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
